nodes.text: 1978 Topps Star Wars Series 4 was a trading card set released by Topps in 1978.

The set was based on Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, and featured stills from the film, promotional photos and behind the scenes photos, all within a green border. Backs of the cards featured "Official Description" or "Movie Facts" themes, or included a portion of a larger image that could be pieced together with other cards like a puzzle. A sub-set of sticker cards was included.
Card numbering in the set continued from the previous series.
Card 206 features an image from the deleted scene of Luke Skywalker repairing a moisture vaporator on Tatooine. The title of Card 232 is "The Empire strikes back!"
